summary: This is an email forwarding a news article from the New York Daily News about Jeffrey Epstein's final days at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York City, as revealed by inmates. The email was sent on December 28, 2020, and appears to be internal correspondence, likely within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded news article detailing his final days in jail before his death.

events.title: Epstein's final days at NYC jail revealed
events.description: A news article reveals details about Jeffrey Epstein's final days at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York City, as described by inmates.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a New York Daily News article about Jeffrey Epstein's final days in jail.
The article's revelations are based on accounts from inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York City.
The email was sent on December 28, 2020, and appears to be internal U.S. Attorney's Office correspondence.
